seo.title: Crypto Price Predictions 2022 (BTC, ETH & 150+ More Coins)
seo.description: Put the chances on your side with daily AI-powered price predictions for over 150 digital currencies. Reduce market noise and identify attractive opportunities with an accuracy rate of above 80%.

main.title: predict prices, win big
main.description: Put the chances on your side with daily AI-powered price predictions for over 150 digital currencies. Reduce market noise and identify attractive opportunities with an accuracy rate of above 80%.

how_works.title: how it works
how_works.description: Our price predictions are the result of a complex 3-module system that collects, analyses, and process market data

array.title: data analysis
array.description: Next up, we process and examine the data using over 200 factors. With a mix of fundamental and technical indicators, we analyse all events influencing prices

array.title: data collector
array.description: Our system gathers and measures market data for 1000+ cryptocurrencies from 8 different exchanges. That's nearly 200TB of raw data

array.title: predictive algorithm
array.description: Finally, our self-learning algorithm prepares predictions for every single coin on the platfom. This  technology is able to recognize patterns, learn from market data, and increase its accuracy over time

profit.title: prediction profit
profit.description: This indicator shows how much you could have earned if you had used our predictions to trade. Oh, no need for a long face... It's never late to start!

array.title: explore and select assets
array.description: Identify the best assets to trade from our list of 150+ coins. Filter the results to pick attractive opportunities in no time

array.title: assess predictions strength
array.description: Our AI system gives you a clear, easy-to-understand prediction on each asset. Look at Prediction Strength to measure the potential accuracy

array.title: let the record show
array.description: Take a quick look at the performance of our AI-powered predictions for the past days and months

array.title: put predictions to the test
array.description: Don't wait another minute. Take action straight from Choise.com Wallet and benefit from instant trade execution and the best exchange rates out there

array.title: get the full picture
array.description: Access a history of all predictions made by our system for a specific asset and their overall profitability. You can use this data to plan your next move!

learn_about_crypto.title: learn everything about crypto card here
learn_about_crypto.description: No matter how deep you are into crypto, Choise.com gives you the tools to learn basic concepts and refine sophisticated knowledge. Guides, courses, and articles to help you every step of the way
